humanDebris.name: humanDebris
humanDebris.label: Human Debris
humanDebris.description: You were sold into slavery at a young age, and became nothing but a tool to the corporations. Tuned like a machine, they forced you into the Neuro Load Amplifier surgery. Having escaped the corporation you worked for, you haven't been able to escape what you are.
humanDebris.quote: Once Human Debris, always Human Debris. I've done nothing but try and make a name for myself, but no one will ever see me any different.

features.name: humanDebrisMods
features.label: Human Debris Mods
features.description: The modifiers for human debris background.

features.name: neuroLoadAmplifier
features.label: Neuro Load Amplifier
features.description: The NLA is a surgery that adds an interlink to EXO technology. Acting as a third brain lobe, the interface gives you the situation awareness of your EXO. +2 to EXOFRAME RESP
